channel.title: Comments on: The Unicorns, Who Will Cut Your Hair When We’re Gone? (Alien8)

item.title: By: Blake
item.dc:creator: Blake
item.description: All the time you wasted on comparing this band and their "sound" to a bunch of other bullshit instead of critiquing the album's content is remarkable
item.content:encoded: All the time you wasted on comparing this band and their “sound” to a bunch of other bullshit instead of critiquing the album’s content is remarkable

item.title: By: listener
item.dc:creator: listener
item.description: in all honesty, you really shouldn't be reviewing albums in genres against which your bias it remarkable. review nickelback or whoever it is you find worthy of your clearly tainted ears.
item.content:encoded: in all honesty, you really shouldn’t be reviewing albums in genres against which your bias it remarkable. review nickelback or whoever it is you find worthy of your clearly tainted ears.
